0.2.0

* Added launch configuration support to launch Felix 4.2+ variants.
* Moved to Eclipse 3.6 API
* Various other improvements/fixups.

0.1.6

* Fixed NPE caused by multiple bundles with same version (Issue 3)
* Included patch from Marcel Hanser to merge felix.auto.* properties into config.properties generated by this plugin (Issue 4)
* Clear Configuration feature now actually clears bundle-cache directory.
